title: Claude Code Teaching Agent Schema
description: Schema for validating Claude Code teaching agent frontmatter configuration

name.description: Agent identifier in kebab-case (lowercase with hyphens)

description.description: Clear description of agent's purpose and teaching approach

tools.description: List of tools the agent can use (capitalized)

model.description: Claude model to use for this agent

activation.description: How the agent should be activated: proactive (auto for domain), manual (explicit), always (every request)

priority.description: Priority level for agent invocation (optional, higher = more priority)

tags.description: Tags for categorizing and discovering agents (optional)
